message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe you'd be very interested in.  I'm asking for $20000 for it.  This is a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $17500?  This gives us both some wiggle room.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $16000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
Bob, I'm getting closer to your offer, but $16000 still isn't quite there.  How about $16500?  This shows I'm serious about finding common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I am willing to offer $16000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
